original_title: The Man with the 7 Second Memory
overview: Once a renowned conductor and musician, Clive was struck down in 1985 by a virus that caused massive damage to his brain. Against the odds, doctors managed to save his life but he was left with a memory that spans just a few seconds.
tagline: No dreams, no memories, no past, and no future.
title: The Man with the 7 Second Memory
